voice.text: Ahem. sings. Laaaaand of the twin suns, how beautiful you are...
Ahem. sings.Yo ho ho and a bottle of rum!
Ahem. sings. Love... and death... and romance... lalala... and so on.
Ahem. sings. Ohhh Tibia, my one true love...
Ahem. sings. A stooory is told, adventures unfold...
Ahem. sings. It's brother against brother, steel against steel...
Ahem. sings. Demons dance in the hall of bones!
Okay, now I need some rum to keep my throat wet.

parameter.value: Oh, just when I wanted to tell him about that treasure.
